Steps.Description: Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent uses Close Combat

Substeps.Description: Step 2a.a: and player gets Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a.b: and player doesn't get a Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2b: If opponent uses Flamethrower, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2b.a: if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2c: If opponent uses Night Slash, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
Step 2d: If opponent switches out into Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2e: If opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
Step 2f: If opponent switches into Garchomp, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2f.a: If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + 2x X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2g: If opponent switches out into Hariyama, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2g.a: If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into  Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2h: If opponent sswitches out into Magnezone, use Earthquake

Substeps.Description: Step 2h.a: If opponent sends Cacturne, switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower. switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados) then sweep

Step 2h.b: If opponent sends out Claydol, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados) then sweep
Step 2h.c: If opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2h.d: If opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep

Step 1b.b: If opponent sends out Electivire, switch into Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol Close Combat. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed. then sweep (Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak)
Step 1b.c: If opponent sends out Excadrill, switch into your own Excadrill then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1b.d: If opponent sends out Garchomp, switch into Excadrill then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
